title: Amazon acquires Rightbot, adds to Robotics Delivery and Packaging Innovation team
description:
Amazon was an investor in Rightbot, which developed a suction-based robot for unloading trucks and trailers.

The post Amazon acquires Rightbot, adds to Robotics Delivery and Packaging Innovation team appeared first on The Robot Report.
